bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>

<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Install PyTorch-lightning with pip install pytorch-lightning Follow the tutorial from William Falcon Run it See error
<denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
Here is my validation step: <denchmark-code> def validation_step(self, val_batch, batch_idx): x, y = val_batch logits = self.forward(x) loss = self.cross_entropy_loss(logits, y) return {'val_loss': loss} </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
No error <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
